win.features:
• New inspection: Missing parameter type
  • Fixed: Method argument is not highlighted when cursor is on a variable in the method body
  • Fixed: Don't consider variables as undefined based on DFA reachability
  • Fixed: Unused import false positive when using parent FQCN as child class namespace
  • Fixed: Trait collision false positive in case of usage of insteadof conflict resolution (PHP >= 7.3)
  • Support vue-loader in file references in Vue template section
  • Snowflake: Stored procedure syntax highlight feature: Javascript language syntax and SQL logic instead of simple text
  • Fixed: Terminal shell path resets to default for the existing projects after updating to 2020.2
  • Fixed: "Windows Defender might impact performance" every time I open any project
  • Fixed: Frequent hangs whilst typing: com.intellij.ui.ScreenUtil.calcInsets
  • Fixed: Local History: WSL Local History is empty
  • Fixed: Colorpicker doesn't work for setting TODO color
  • Fixed: Right click on parametrized SQL query shows popup with parameters instead of context menu
  • Fixed: Angular elements are shown as unknown in stylesheets
  • Fixed: Project View: Cmd-Click file no longer adds file to selection
  • Fixed: Extractor outputs binary strings as binary literals
  • Fixed: Yarn 2: Typescript go to declaration moves to Import instead of declaration
  • Fixed: KWallet access crashes intellij
  • Fixed: Can't connect via SSH if there's a key that is not a file, or it is corrupted, or something similar
  • Fixed: When GitHub Enterprise URL starts with "github.com" Pull Requests don't work

Many other features and changes from the IntelliJ platform and web are also included.
See blog and release notes for more details.
